name: "Buckets" Nelson Exp.
effect: Experienced. Shootout: If Buckets is at a shootout and out of town, you can discard a card from your hand to create one Shark in Nelson's posse. The Shark is a Non-Unique, 1-Stud, 0-Influence, ace-value Dude. Sharks are removed from play after the shootout. Nelson can perform this action any number of times per turn.

name: "Rails" Richardson
effect: Noon: Move Rails and one other of your dudes at his location from one strike to another. This does not boot Rails or your other dude.

name: A Coach Comes to Town
effect: Any one of your opponents dudes can do a job to rob the stage in the Town Square. Any of your dudes can put together a posse to protect it. If the stage goes unprotected or your opponent wins the shootout, you must pay your opponent 4 Ghost Rock (or your total Ghost Rock if you have less than 4). If you win the Shootout or the stage is not attacked, you gain 4 ghost rock.

name: A Secret Tunnel
effect: Noon: Choose two deeds you own. There is a secret tunnel between those two deeds and they are considered "adjacent" whenever you wish for the rest of the game.

name: Abandoned Mine
effect: Private. Strike. Only Terrors may move to the Abandoned Mine.

name: Ace in the Hole
effect: Reaction: Play after Draw Hands have been revealed for any draw. You may discard one of your cards and replace it with either a card from your Play Hand or the top card from your deck.

name: All Saints Day
effect: Every player with one or more Blessed in play can get any one Miracle from his or her deck, show it to the other players, and put it into his or her Play hand. All decks are reshuffled. Ace this card.

name: Ambush
effect: Noon Job: Boot one of your dudes and assemble a posse to ace any dude in play. If the job is successful, the target is aced. All of the dudes in your posse become Wanted unless the target was Wanted.

name: And Stay Down!
effect: Reaction: Play when a Harrowed dude is about to be aced. The Harrowed dude is aced and sent to Boot Hill - no pull is performed.

name: Apache Devil Dancers
effect: Reaction Spirit 6: Boot this Shaman immediately after an event is revealed in someone's lowball Draw hand. If this Spirit is successful, that event is discarded without effect. Reaction Spirit 8: Boot this Shaman immediately after an event is revealed in someone's lowball Draw hand. If this Spirit is successful, that event is aced without effect.

name: Arizona Jane
effect: Non-Unique. Noon: Boot Jane to move her to a location you own but do not control. Jane then calls out one dude at that location.

name: Arson
effect: Noon Job: Boot one of your dudes and name a deed in play. If the job is successful, Pull: if the pull is clubs or spades, ace the deed, and everyone in your posse becomes Wanted.

name: Austin Stoker
effect: Shootout: All Terrors in this Shootout with a Bullet Rating below 3 have their rating reduced to zero.

name: Avarice
effect: Any location with Avarice in it has its printed ghost rock production doubled. Noon: Boot Avarice to get any strike from your deck. Show it to the other players and place it in your hand. Shuffle your deck. Discard a card from your hand.

name: Babble On
effect: Noon Miracle X: Boot this blessed and target one dude in play. The difficulty of this Miracle is three times the target's Influence. If this Miracle is successful, the target has his or her Influence reduced to zero until after Nightfall.

name: Bad Tequila
effect: Noon: Boot any dude in play with influence less than two.

name: Barkum & Barkum Attorneys
effect: Private. Controller Noon Pull: Boot the attorneys and one of your Wanted dudes. If the pull's value is less than or equal to the dude's value, the dude is no longer Wanted.

name: Barthalomew Prospectus
effect: Mad Scientist:2 Reaction: Boot Barhalomew immediately after you perform a noon action. You may perform another one immediately.

name: Basil Whateley
effect: Huckster:2 Noon Pull: Boot Basil and target one dude in play. If the pull plus Basil's Huckster skill are greater than the dude's value, the dude is booted.

name: Benjamin Dean
effect: Shootout: Target a Terror in this Shootout. If that Terror is aced during the Shootout, the Fear Level is reduced by one (minimum one).

name: Benny Hibbs
effect: Non-Unique. Mad Scientist:0 Reaction: Boot Benny to reduce the cost of a Gadget by two as it is being brought into play.

name: Between the Shoulderblades
effect: Reaction: Play this card when a Dude is leaving a shootout due to a card effect of his controller. Ace that Dude.

name: Big Jake…
effect: The cost to bring Jake into play from your Play Hand and his upkeep are reduced by one if you have Scooter in play. Reaction: Boot Jake immediately before the upkeep phase to reduce the production of one strike to zero for this turn.

name: Billy Iron Horse
effect: Noon: Boot Billy and discard up to three cards from your hand. Draw a number of cards equal to the number you discarded.

name: Billy No-Neck
effect: May not have any weapons.

name: Black Jack Exp.
effect: Experienced. Black Jack is always Wanted, and cannot become un-Wanted. You always get to perform the first Shootout action when Black Jack is in your posse, continuing to the player on your left.

name: Blackjacks
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:19 Noon: Boot one of your Blackjacks dudes to gain 2 ghost rock. The dude becomes Wanted. This action can be performed any number of times per turn.

name: Blood Curse
effect: Noon Hex 8: If this Hex is successful, one dude in play has a -1 Bullet and -1 Influence penalty until after nightfall. Shootout Hex 9: If this Hex is successful, one dude in this shootout has a -2 Bullet penalty until nightfall.

name: Bluff
effect: Reaction: Play immediately after Players have revealed their Draw Hands. Discard yours and draw five cards which become your new Draw Hand.

name: Bob Bidwell
effect: Non-Unique.

name: Bob's Fix-it Shop
effect: Private. Controller Reaction: Boot the Fix-it Shop when one of your Gadgets is being aced to place it in your Play Hand. Controller Reaction: Boot the Fix-it Shop when one of your goods is being aced to place it in your Discard pile.

name: Bounty Hunter
effect: Noon: A Bounty Hunter (dude) with a two stud Bullet Rating and zero Influence, calls out one Wanted dude in play who cannot refuse. The Bounty Hunter is under your control. After the shootout, the Bounty Hunter is removed from play.

name: Brawl
effect: Noon: Target any location. Until after nightfall, any dude in this location may, as a Noon action, start a Shootout with any other dude at that location. The losers of the Shootout are sent home booted, instead of being aced.

name: Bucket Brigade
effect: Reaction: Play when one deed is about to be aced. The deed is not aced, but may not perform any actions for the rest of this turn and does not produce ghost rock next turn.

name: Buffalo Chip Saloon
effect: Public.To call a dude out in the Buffalo Chip Saloon, a player must pay one Ghostrock to the Buffalo Chip's controller.

name: Buffalo Rifle
effect: Weapon. If this dude is adjacent to a location where a job or Shootout is taking place, he may join the posse without moving or booting, and may join even if booted.

name: Bullet-Proof Vest
effect: Gadget Difficulty:3 The wearer of the Bullet-Proof Vest cannot be aced by the results of a Shootout unless his Draw Hand is beaten by at least two Ranks. Continue the Shootout for another round, if necessary.

name: Bum Rush
effect: Shootout: One of your dudes in this Shootout gets a +1 Bullet bonus for this Shootout. Only one Bum Rush can be played per Shootout.

name: Burial Ground
effect: Out of Town. Private. The Burial Ground is worth +1 Control Point if controlled by a Sioux player. Hexes and Miracles have their Difficulty raised by 4 when performed by a Dude at this location, and Spirits have their Difficulty lowered by 2 when performed by a Dude at this location.

name: Burn 'Em Down
effect: Shootout: Boot one of your dudes in this Shootout to reduce the Bullet Rating of one opposing dude in this gunfight by a number of Bullets equal to your dude`s Bullet Rating.

name: Bushwhacked
effect: Noon: Boot one of your Dudes to bushwhack another player's booted Dude at the same location. Each Dude's controller pulls. The Dude whose Bullet rating plus pull is lower is aced. If there is a tie, there is no effect. Your Dude becomes Wanted.

name: Buster Madison
effect: Huckster:0 Noon: Boot Buster at a saloon to produce 1 ghost rock.

name: Byron St. James
effect: You cannot move St. James to any location that contains Howard Findley. (This does not affect bringing St. James into play.)

name: California Queen
effect: River Boat. Casino. Saloon. Out of Town. Public. This Deed is considered adjacent to all Strikes in play. Any Dude not controlled by the California Queen's owner who moves to the Queen must pay 1 Ghost Rock to the Queen's owner.

name: Callahan's Ditch
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Captain Sim Yut-San Exp.
effect: Experienced Noon: Boot Captain Sim and reduce his Influence to zero to reduce the Influence of any dude in play to zero. These reductions last until the end of the turn.

name: Casino Morongo
effect: Public. Dudes aced in a Shootout in the Morongo do not go to Boot Hill - they go to their Owner's discard pile, instead.

name: Cassidy Greene
effect: Non-Unique. If you control a saloon, you may bring Cassidy into play for free at the saloon. Noon: Give a +1 Bullet bonus until the end of the turn to any other dude at the same deed as Cassidy. The Dude keeps the bonus even if he or she moves.

name: Charlie Landers
effect: Charlie Landers may not be called out. Charlie cannot move to a location you do not control. Noon: Boot Charlie when in a saloon to dispense free drinks, resulting in a -1 Bullet penalty (minimum zero) until nightfall, for all other dudes in the same saloon as Charlie.

name: Cheatin' Varmint
effect: Cheatin'! Reaction: Play when another Player reveals an illegal Draw Hand. His Draw Hand is reduced by 3 Ranks from its actual value (and is considered the worst possible hand of that Rank). Only one Cheatin' card can be played against a Player per draw.

name: Chester Nero
effect: Harrowed.

name: Claim Jumper
effect: Noon: Boot one of your dudes at a strike you Control. You are now the Owner of the strike until the end of the game.

name: Clean Up the Town
effect: Noon: Boot one of your dudes to call out any Wanted dude who is in town. If he refuses, his Influence is permanently reduced to zero. If it was already zero, he is aced if he refuses.

name: Clell Miller
effect: Non-Unique. Clell Miller gains a permanent +1 Bullet bonus each time his posse aces another dude with a higher Bullet Rating in a Shootout.

name: Cletus Peacock
effect: Non-Unique. Cletus gains a +2 Bullet bonus for that Shootout when he calls someone out.

name: Collegium
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:17 You have one additional Control Point for every Gadget in play with Gadget Difficulty higher than four.

name: Colorado Lode
effect: Private. Strike. You may ace any one strike that produces less than 3 ghost rock per turn when this card is brought into play. If you ace your own strike, then the cost of this strike is reduced by the production value of the one you aced.

name: Consecrate Armament
effect: Noon Miracle 3: If this Miracle is successful, give a +1 bullet bonus to any weapon in play (and makes it mystical) until after nightfall. Noon Miracle 7: If this Miracle is successful, give a +2 bullet bonus to any weapon in play (and makes it mystical) until after nightfall.

name: Cordelia "Corky" Hendricks
effect: Shootout Pull: If the pull is red, Corky gets a +2 Bullet bonus for this Shootout. If it's black, she gets a -1 Bullet penalty (minimum zero) for this Shootout. Corky can do this action once per Shootout.

name: Cort Williams
effect: Terrors in the same location as Williams have their influence reduced to zero. Shootout: Ace a Terror in this Shootout.

name: Crack Shot
effect: Shootout: One dude's Draw bonus is changed to a Stud bonus until the end of this Shootout.

name: Danny Hamilton
effect: Experienced. Noon: Move any Texas Rangers to a location with a Terror in it if the Terror is in Hamilton's location or an adjacent location.

name: Dead Man's Hand
effect: Noon: Boot one of your dudes who calls out any booted dude in play. The called out dude must accept and enter the Shootout. If your dude has a lower Bullet Rating than the target, raise it to be equal in magnitude. If your dude survives the Shootout, he becomes Wanted.

name: Deadland
effect: Public. Non-Unique. Bring into play for free if the Fear Level is 6 or higher. Subsequent Deadlands must have 1 higher Fear Level to be played. Controller Reaction: Boot when you are bringing a Terror into play to produce 5 ghost rock.

name: Dealer's Choice
effect: All Draws are played as Lowball until after nightfall. Ace this card.

name: Death's Head Joker
effect: Death's Head Joker This card is only useful for Draws. If it is pulled, ace it and redraw. Ace this card after it used in a draw. If it is revealed as part of a lowball Draw hand during the Gambling Phase, it is aced and replaced by the top card of your deck. If it is revealed in a shootout Draw hand, it can be any suit and value, and in addition the lowest value dude in the opposing posse is aced before hand ranks are compared. This card does not count against your deck limit. You may not have more than two Jokers in your deck.

name: Delores Whateley
effect: Experienced. Huckster:1 Shootout: If Delores is at the Whateley Family Estate or a location with "Graveyard" or "Undertaker" in the title, discard any number of black cards from your hand. Each card discarded in this fashion creates one Skeleton - a 2-Stud, 0-Influence, ace-value Dude - in this shootout. Skeletons are removed from play after the shootout.

name: Demon's Eye
effect: Hex Noon 7: If this Hex is successful, discard any or all cards in your hand. Hex Noon 10: Boot this Huckster. If this Hex is successful, discard any or all cards in your hand and draw up to your maximum hand size.

name: Den of Eastern Delights
effect: Public. Non-Unique. Owner Reaction: Boot to cancel the effects of an event immediately after it is revealed. The event is aced.

name: Deputize
effect: Noon: All of your dudes that are not currently in your Outfit become members of your Outfit.

name: Deputy John Templeton
effect: Templeton gets a +2 Bullet bonus while anyone in an opposing posse in a shootout has a lower value.

name: Derringer
effect: Shootout: One of your dudes in this gunfight has a Derringer. Attach this card to your dude. This card acts in all ways as if it were a +1 Bullet weapon goods card. The Derringer can only be chosen as a weapon for one round of a Shootout per turn.

name: Dispatch Office
effect: Private. Any of the Controller's dudes at this location with Influence greater than zero has his or her Influence increased by one while at this location.

name: Diversion
effect: Reaction: Play when a dude is about to boot to join a posse. That dude does not boot, and cannot join the posse.

name: Double Dealin'
effect: Cheatin'! Reaction: Play when another Player reveals an illegal Draw Hand. That Player's entire Draw Hand is discarded and replaced by the top five cards of your deck. Your cards are discarded normally afterwards. Only one Cheatin' card can be played against a Player per draw.

name: Dragon's Nest Strike
effect: Private. Strike. The dude or dudes in play with the lowest value are aced when this strike is put into play from your Play Hand.

name: Drinks On the House
effect: Reaction: Play immediately after an event has resolved. Until the end of the game, events with that name do not resolve when they appear. Ace this card.

name: Drop in the Ocean Strike
effect: Private. Non-Unique. Strike.

name: Drought
effect: For each dude that any player wishes to unboot during nightfall this turn, that player must pay one ghost rock, or the dude remains booted.

name: Dust Devil
effect: Noon: Ace any one goods card in play.

name: Eagle Rock
effect: Will not call out a Sioux.

name: Easter Sunday
effect: Each Player may pull for each one of their dudes that was aced last turn. If the pull is red, he or she is returned to play as a normal, non-Harrowed dude. Ace this card.

name: Eddie Bellows
effect: Eddie can never have a Bullet Rating higher than two. Shootout: Boot Eddie to look at the Play Hand of an opponent who has dudes at this Shootout.

name: Elijah Exp.
effect: Experienced. Blessed:4 Terrors cannot call out Elijah. Noon: Take a Miracle from another of your Dudes and attach it to Elijah. Reaction: When you attach a Miracle to Elijah, draw a card from your deck and add it to your hand.

name: Envy
effect: Blessed:0 Shootout: Target one dude. That dude may not be the shooter during this Shootout, if another dude is available.

name: Erik Zarkov Exp.
effect: Experienced. Mad Scientist:2 Do not pull when Zarkov is creating a Weapon Gadget. The Gadget automatically works.

name: Eureka!
effect: Eureka enters play attached to your gang. Whenever Eureka attaches to a Player's gang, he draws 2 cards and adds them to his Play Hand. A Player's maximum hand size is increased by 2 while Eureka is attached. Eureka leaves that Player when a dude in his gang is aced and attaches to the next Player on the left. Only one Eureka can be in play at a time.

name: Eureka?!?
effect: If 'Eureka!' is in play, it is sent to the card owner's Boot Hill. Eureka enters play attached to the gang on your left. Whenever Eureka attaches to a Player's gang, he must discard one card from his or her hand. A Player's hand size is reduced by one while Eureka is attached. Eureka leaves that Player when he or she wins a shootout and attaches to the next player on the left. Only one Eureka can be in play at a time.

name: Exorcism
effect: Noon Miracle X: The difficulty of this Miracle is the value of a Terror in the same or an adjacent location. If this Miracle is successful, the Terror is aced. If this Miracle is successful by more than 5 points, the Terror is aced, sent to Boot Hill automatically, and can never return to play.

name: Ezzie
effect: The Harrowed Harlot. Noon: Boot Ezzie and target a dude. That dude's Controller performs three Pulls: if all three pulls are higher than the dude's value, the dude is aced. If the dude's controller cannot make three pulls, any pulls the controller cannot make are considered successful.

name: Fanning the Hammer
effect: Reaction: Play when your posse has won a round of a Shootout to increase by two the number of dudes aced in the opposing posse.

name: Father Juan Nevarro Exp.
effect: Experienced. Blessed:1 Father Juan may not boot to perform the Blackjack Outfit's ability. Hexes and Spirits cannot target Father Juan.

name: Fineas von Landingham
effect: Mad Scientist:0 Noon: Boot von Landingham to gain 2 ghost rock, brought in by airship from a secret mine in the Badlands.

name: Fish Ridge Mine
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Flamethrower
effect: Weapon. Gadget Difficulty:5 You must pay one ghost rock to use this weapon in a Shootout. This dude is a Stud in a Shootout. If a dude carrying the flamethrower is aced in a Shootout, Pull: If it is odd, then the flamethrower explodes, acing two more of your dudes in this fight (your choice).

name: Flim
effect: Abomination. No Goods. Flim has no upkeep when he is adjacent to Elijah. Shootout: Ace any one dude in the opposing posse with a value lower than Flim's bullet rating.

name: Foale's Folly
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Foreclosure
effect: Cheatin'! Reaction: Play when another Player reveals an illegal Draw Hand. Select one deed owned by that player which is discarded. Only one Cheatin'! card can be played against a Player per draw.

name: Founder's Day
effect: Gain 2 ghost rock.

name: Framed
effect: The ghost rock cost of this card is double the target's Influence. Noon: Target one dude in play who becomes Wanted. That dude's Controller may, as a Noon action, boot a Law Dog he controls to Pull: if the pull is a red card, the dude is no longer Wanted and that Player can choose one of your dudes who becomes Wanted instead.

name: Friendly Game
effect: Noon: Boot one of your dudes who begins gambling with any non-terror dude at the same location. Each player draws a draw hand, and the winner takes ghost rock equal to the difference between hands from the loser (up to the loser's entire stockpile of ghost rock).

name: Friends in Low Places
effect: Noon: Look at one of your opponents' Play Hands.

name: Fu Leng's Laundry & tailoring
effect: Private. Fu Leng's cost is reduced by 2 if you have Tao Cheng in play.

name: Full Moon
effect: Choose a dude and Pull: If the card's value is greater than the dude's value, then you gain control of the dude until after nightfall, but his upkeep cost is tripled for this turn. If you do not pay the upkeep, the dude is immediately returned to his original Controller. Ace this card.

name: Gatling Pistol
effect: Weapon. Gadget Difficulty:3

name: Gerald Klippstein Exp.
effect: Experienced. Mad Scientist:3 Shootout: Boot Klippstein to move him and any one of your Dudes at his location into the shootout's location and join them with either posse. Noon: Move Klippstein to another location.

name: Get a Rope
effect: Cheatin'! Reaction: Play when another Player reveals an illegal Draw Hand. Boot one of your dudes and call out any one of that Player's dudes for a Shootout. This Shootout cannot be refused, and no other dudes may join the Shootout. Only one Cheatin'! card can be played against a Player per draw.

name: Ghost Rock Detector
effect: Gadget Difficulty:5 Noon: Discard the Detector to go through your deck, retrieve any one Strike, and immediately put it into play. The cost of the Strike is reduced by 4 Ghost Rock. Pay all other costs normally.

name: Giddyup!
effect: Reaction: Play immediately before one of your dudes boots to join a posse. Your dude does not have to boot to join this posse.

name: Git!
effect: Noon Pull: If the pull value is greater than the value of the target dude at one of your deeds, start a Shootout that may not be refused between that dude and one of your dudes at the same location. Any dudes adjacent to the deed may join either side of the Shootout. Dudes not actually in the target's location must boot to join the posse.

name: Gluttony
effect: All Goods being attached to Gluttony have their costs reduced by two. Goods cannot be moved off of Gluttony without a card effect.

name: Golden Mare Hotel
effect: Public. Brothel. The Owner gains one ghost rock each time a dude is put into play from someone's Play Hand.

name: Government Audit
effect: After upkeep this turn, all Players must pay 1 ghost rock for each deed they control up to the total ghost rock in their Vault.

name: Graveyard
effect: Private. The Owner gains 3 ghost rock each time a dude is aced. Controller Reaction: Boot the Graveyard to negate the Harrowing of any dude.

name: Green-Eye Saloon
effect: Public. Non-Unique.

name: Gunther Hapworth
effect: Mad Scientist:1 Noon: Boot Gunther at any location and pay 1 Ghost Rock. Give him a +3 Bullet Stud bonus until the end of next turn that is in effect whenever he is at a location you control.

name: Head 'em Off at the Pass
effect: Reaction: Play when a Posse is being assembled for a job. Any one of your dudes can join the posse, regardless of their location and whether or not they are booted. You may not join a posse if the Player assembling it does not want you to.

name: Headsman's Axe
effect: Reaction: Play immediately after any dude is aced. The dude may not be brought into play again through any means.

name: Hector Casparo
effect: Non-Unique. Reaction: After Draw hands are revealed, you can discard a card from your Draw hand and redraw one card when Casparo is gambling (as a result of a card effect) or in a Shootout.

name: Hell's Commin' With Me
effect: Reaction: Play this card when one of your Dudes is aced during a shootout. Target one of your Dudes who, until after Nightfall, gains a +2 Bullet bonus and becomes a Stud.

name: Hell's End Mine
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Hell's Fury
effect: Noon Pull: Choose a dude in Boot Hill that you also hold in your Play Hand. If the value of the pull is higher than the dude's value, remove the dude in Boot Hill from play and bring your dude into play, without costs. This dude is now Harrowed.

name: Helpin' Hand
effect: Reaction Hex X: Boot this Huckster when a dude is aced. The difficulty of this Hex is equal to the Dude's value plus Influence plus bullets. If the Hex is successful, the Dude is not aced, but is moved home booted.

name: His Back Was to Me
effect: Shootout: Reduce the Bullet Rating of one opposing dude to be equal to the highest bullet Rating in your posse. If you donot have any Studs in your posse, the target becomes a Draw bonus fighter as well. The reduction is only for this round of the Shootout.

name: Holdout Knife
effect: Reaction Pull: Ace the Knife immediately when this dude is aced in a Shootout. Target one dude in the opposing posse. If the pull is equal to or greater than the target's value, the target is aced.

name: Holy Roller
effect: Noon Miracle 6: If this Miracle is successful, this Blessed gains a +1 Bullet and +1 Influence until after nightfall. Shootout Miracle 8: If this Miracle is successful, this Blessed cannot be aced in this Shootout unless your hand is beaten by at least 3 ranks.

name: Howard Findley
effect: While you have Howard Findley in play, your strikes cost 1 less ghost rock to put into play and they produce 1 additional ghost rock per turn.

name: Howlin' Hollow
effect: Private. Strike. Haunted. Controller Noon: Boot to give a Harrowed dude +1 Bullet bonus for this turn.

name: Humphrey Walters
effect: Town Founder. Lycanthrope. Shootout Pull: You can use this ability once per shootout. If the pull is red, put the Werewolf into play unbooted and under your control from your hand in place of Humphrey and put Humphrey into your play hand. Humphrey and the Werewolf are different Dudes for uniqueness purposes. All attached cards are discarded. If a Full Moon has occurred this turn, this pull is automatically red.

name: Idleness
effect: Non-Unique. Blessed:1

name: Inspiration
effect: Reaction Miracle X: Perform this Miracle immediately after one of your dudes aces a Terror with a value greater than 5. The difficulty of this Miracle is the current fear level times two. If this Miracle is successful, you gain a Victory Point. Discard this Miracle.

name: It Was a Mountain Lion
effect: Pull: The dude or dudes in play whose value is closest to the pull gets aced.

name: J.P. Coleman Exp.
effect: Harrowed. Experienced. The Former Sherrif. Reaction: When J.P. is aced in a Shootout, target one dude in the opposing posse. Until the end of the game, while J.P. faces that dude in a Shootout, he gains a +1 Bullet bonus (cumulative).

name: Jackelope Stampede
effect: Cheatin! Reaction: Play when another player reveals an illegal Draw hand. That player must select and discard one of his cards in play. Then, that hand is discarded without effect and the player must draw 5 new cards for his or her Draw hand. That player must continue discarding cards and redrawing until he reveals a legal Draw hand or he has no cards in play. Only one Cheatin' card can be played against a player per draw.

name: Jail
effect: Private. Government. Any Player who aces a Wanted dude may elect instead to put them in the Jail, collecting a bounty equal to half the jailed dude's ghost rock cost. A dude in Jail is out of play (except for uniqueness) until they are broken out with a Noon Job.

name: Jebediah Whateley
effect: Huckster:1

name: Jessie Freemont
effect: Non-Unique. Jessie will not call out a Law Dog.

name: Jim MacNeil Exp.
effect: Experienced. Noon: MacNeil can call out any Dude who has called out a Sweetrock Dude this turn or last turn, if that Dude is in MacNeil's location or an adjacent location.

name: Joe Larson
effect: Non-Unique.

name: John Bloody Knife
effect: Shootout: Replace Joseph Eyes-Like-Rain in a posse that John is not in. Joseph goes to your home, booted.

name: Johnny Quaid
effect: Sweetrock dudes may not call out Quaid.

name: Joker
effect: This card is only useful for draws and pulls. Ace this card after it is used in a draw or pull. This card is a Wildcard: it can be any suit and value. You may not have more than two Jokers in a deck. This card does not count against your deck limit.

name: Josef Nicolai Rocescu
effect: Shootout: If Rocescu has no weapons and there is an abomination in the opposing posse, Josef gains +4 bullets for the rest of this Shootout.

name: Joseph Eyes-Like-Rain
effect: Shaman:4 Reaction: Boot Joseph when you have just discarded a Draw Hand. Take any one card from the Draw Hand and place it in your Play Hand. Discard a card if you have more than five.

name: Judge Henry Warwick
effect: Noon Job: Boot Warwick to assemble a posse to ace any Wanted dude in play. Warwick must be in the posse.

name: Just a Graze
effect: Reaction: Play after Hands have been shown in a Shootout. The number of your dudes killed in that round is reduced by one and the Shootout continues normally.

name: Kansas City Kara
effect: Lycanthrope. Noon Pull: If the pull is red, put the Werewolf into play in this location. Put Kara in your hand with all of her goods. If a full moon has been played this turn, the pull is automatically red and cannot be changed from red in any way.

name: Katie Karl
effect: Any dude you are bringing into play has his or her cost reduced by their bullet rating while Katie is in play.

name: Kenny
effect: Sidekick. While this dude is in a Shootout, Kenny acts as an additional dude in the posse with a zero-draw Bullet Rating.

name: Kidnapping
effect: Noon Job: Boot one of your dudes to kidnap any dude in play with a lower Bullet Rating that is controlled by another player. If the job is successful the kidnapped dude is discarded, and all of the dudes in your posse become wanted.

name: King Willy's Mother Lode
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Labor Dispute
effect: Strikes produce two less ghost rock this turn.

name: Lad Saloon
effect: Public. Any dude called out while occupying the LAD Saloon has +1 Bullet for the shootout.

name: Lady Luck
effect: Noon: You may discard as many of your cards as you like during nightfall this turn.

name: Law Dogs
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:19 You get one Victory Point every time you put a Wanted dude into Jail. You get one Victory Point every time you ace a Wanted dude who has more than one Influence.

name: Lawrence Goodman
effect: Noon: One of your other dudes at a different location begins a job at the deed Goodman is in. If the job is successful and this deed is in town, take ghost rock from the deed's owner equal to the Bullet Rating of the dude performing the deed.

name: Lay On Hands
effect: Reaction Miracle 8: Boot this blessed when a dude is aced. If this Miracle is successful, the dude is not aced, but is moved home booted. If the Miracle is not successful, this Blessed cannot straighten next turn, and loses one Influence permanently (minimum zero).

name: Lechery
effect: Blessed:1

name: Legal Offices of ______
effect: Private. Controller Noon: Pay 3 ghost rock to gain one Control Point until after nightfall. A Player may not perform this action more than twice per turn.

name: Lightning Strike
effect: Shootout Spirit X: The difficulty of this Spirit is an opposing Dude's value plus Bullets. If this Spirit is successful, the target is booted and sent home. If the Spirit is successful by more than 5 points, the target is aced as well. If you pull an ace or Joker, the Shaman is also aced.

name: Lilith Vandekamp
effect: Noon: Boot Lilith to gain 2 ghost rock if she is in a saloon or brothel.

name: Little Running Bear Exp.
effect: Experienced. Shaman:0 Noon: Boot Bear to move him to any location with a Terror and begin a shootout between Bear and the Terror. No other dudes may join.

name: Long Arm of the Law
effect: Boot all Wanted dudes in play.

name: Look Homeward Mine
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Los Diablos Stampede
effect: The dude (or dudes) in play with the highest value is chased by the Stampede. Pull for each dude being chased; If the pull value is less than or equal to the dude's Bullet rating, he is booted. If the pull is greater than the dude's Bullet rating, but less than his value, he goes into his owner's hand. Otherwise, he's aced. Ace this card.

name: Los Ojos Del Dios
effect: Huckster:0 Shaman:0 Blessed:0

name: Lucky Horseshoe Lode
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Magnetic Poles Realign
effect: All Gadgets in play are booted. No gadgets may be created this turn. Gadgets cannot be used, and provide no bonuses (or control points) this turn. Ace this Card.

name: Manitou's Revenge
effect: Reaction: Play when a spell fails. Pull: if the value is lower than the spell's difficulty, the dude performing the spell is aced.

name: Marcus Perriwinkle
effect: Non-Unique. Mad Scientist:0 Gadgets being attached to Marcus have their ghost rock cost reduced by two.

name: Max Baine
effect: Non-Unique.

name: Maze Dragon
effect: Abomination. May not have goods. The Maze Dragon cannot move to or join posses at locations in town.

name: Medicine
effect: Reaction Spirit X: Boot this shaman when a dude is aced. The difficulty of this Spirit is equal to the dude's value plus Influence plus Bullets. If the Spirit is successful, the dude is not aced, but is moved home booted.

name: Meredith Singleton
effect: Noon: Boot Meredith to boot any non-Terror dude at the same location. (Anyone will listen to Meredith speak.)

name: Mick Caples
effect: Non-Unique. Reaction: When you put a strike into play, boot Mick and Pull: If it is a face card, the strike's production increases by one. If it is a Joker, the strike's production increases by 2.

name: Mind Twist
effect: Noon Hex X: Boot this Huckster. The difficulty of this Hex is three times the target's Influence. If the Hex is successful, the target in play has his or her Influence reduced by two (minimum zero) until after nightfall.

name: Miss Coutreau's
effect: Private.

name: Mitobu
effect: Shootout: Ace any Abomination in the opposing posse. Mitobu cannot be your shooter and provides no extra cards in this shootout. You cannot perform this action if Mitobu is the only dude in your posse.

name: Moses Whateley-Braun
effect: Non-Unique. Huckster:0

name: Mustang
effect: Horse. Reaction: Boot the Mustang instead of this dude when joining a posse. A booted dude cannot join in this fashion.

name: Nash Bilton Exp.
effect: Experienced. Nash will not call out a Sweetrock dude. Noon: Boot Nash to call out one dude at an adjacent location. The Shootout will take place in Nash's location - the target moves to this location.

name: Nate Hunter Exp.
effect: Experienced. Sheriff of Gomorra. Noon: Nate can call out any Wanted Dude in his location or an adjacent location. If the Wanted Dude does not accept the challenge, that Dude goes to his or her owner's discard pile.

name: Nelson Roberts
effect: Roberts can attach any card with "Rifle" in the title at no cost.

name: Nice Boots, Chief
effect: Reaction: Play when an opposing dude is aced in a Shootout. Take any one goods from that dude and attach it to one of your dudes that was in the Shootout.

name: Nicodemus Whateley Exp.
effect: Experienced. Huckster:3 You can ignore the upkeep cost of one Abomination you control, each turn.Noon Pull: Target one hex attached to Nicodemus. Nicodemus can use that hex two times this turn. If the pull is greater than the hex's value, it is aced immediately after nightfall.

name: No Funny Stuff
effect: Shootout: No Reactions can be played until after this Shootout is over. No more Shootout actions can be played for this Shootout.

name: Old Moon Saloon
effect: Public. Any time another Player reveals an illegal Draw Hand, the Owner of the Old Moon Saloon gains one ghost rock.

name: On the Side Strike
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Orphanage
effect: Private. Government. Controller Reaction: Boot the Orphanage at the beginning of the upkeep phase to double the ghost rock production of one strike deed this turn (after other bonuses).

name: Oswald Hardinger
effect: Mad Scientist:4 Reaction: Boot Oswald as a Gadget is producing an action to cancel the action. Shootout: Boot Oswald to reduce a weapon Gadget's bonus to zero. Only affects weapons in a Shootout Oswald is in.

name: Out of Ammo
effect: Shootout: Target dude in this Shootout becomes a Draw instead of a Stud.

name: Pacific Maze Railstation
effect: Public. Railstation produces 1 ghost rock per Maze Rat in play. Controller Reaction: Boot Railstation to raise or lower the cost of any goods being purchased by 2 ghost rock.

name: Pair of Six-Shooters
effect: Weapon. Shootout: Look at the top five cards of your deck. You may discard all five if you desire, otherwise, place them back on top of your deck in the same order.

name: Pearl-Handled Revolver
effect: Weapon. This dude is a Stud in a Shootout.

name: Phantom Fingers
effect: Noon Hex 7: If this Hex is successful, take any one goods on a Dude in an adjacent location and give it to this Huckster if she can hold it. Shootout Hex 8: If this Hex is successful, take any one weapon attached to an opposing Dude and give it to this Huckster if she can hold it.

name: Pike's Puddle Mine
effect: Private. Non-Unique. Strike.

name: Pinto
effect: Horse. Shootout: Boot the Pinto to remove this dude from this Shootout. Move this dude to any out of town deed you control (or home if you have no out of town deeds). This dude is booted. Pull: If the value is greater than your dude's value, the Pinto is aced at the end of the ride.

name: Pistol Whip
effect: Shootout: Send one of the opponent's dudes in this fight home, booted. Give a -1 Bullet (minimum zero) to one of your dudes in this fight for the rest of the Shootout.

name: Po Yu
effect: Huckster:2

name: Pony Express
effect: Private.Controller Noon: Boot to discard a card and draw a new one.

name: Pox Walker
effect: Abomination. Non-Unique. Noon: One dude in this location has his value reduced by three permanently. If this reduces the dude's value below one, the dude is aced.

name: Pride
effect: Pride will not leave a Shootout without a card effect.

name: Prof. Parnham's Miracle Elixir
effect: Gadget Difficulty:4 Reaction: Ace the Elixir instead of this dude. Return the dude home, booted.

name: Prof. Susan Franklin
effect: Mad Scientist:0

name: Puppet
effect: Noon Hex X: The difficulty of this Hex is equal to the value plus Influence plus bullets of a dude at this Huckster's location. If this Hex is successful, you take control of the dude until after nightfall.

name: Quickdraw
effect: Reaction: Play in the event of a tie (the same Hand Rank) in a Shootout to win the Shootout by one Rank.

name: Rachel Sumner Exp.
effect: Experienced. Noon: Rachel may call out any Law Dog in her location or in an adjacent location. Rachel becomes Wanted.

name: Raid
effect: Noon Job: One of your dudes gathers a posse to raid your opponent's Vault, at his or her home. If the Raid is successful, Pull the top card from your opponent's deck and take an amount of ghost rock equal to half the value (round up) from the target Player. All dudes in your posse become Wanted.

name: Ray Gun
effect: Weapon. Gadget Difficulty:6 This Gadget has no cost if being attached to Zarkov.

name: Red Hill Hotel
effect: Public. Controller Reaction: Boot the Hotel at the beginning of the upkeep phase to negate the upkeep cost of any dude you control.

name: Red Spade
effect: Reaction: Play immediately after a pull is revealed to change the suit or color of the pull to the suit or color of your choice.

name: Refuse to Fall
effect: Reaction: Play when your last dude is being aced in a Shootout. If the dude has Influence greater than zero, reduce it by one permanently instead of acing the dude: you do not lose your last dude in this round. This dude is aced after the Shootout.

name: Reserves
effect: Noon: Gain 1 ghost rock.

name: Reverend Simon MacPherson Exp.
effect: Experienced. Blessed:2 Harrowed dudes may not call MacPherson out. Shootout: Boot MacPherson to ace one Terror in this shootout.

name: Richard Boothe
effect: While Boothe is at another player's strike, it produces no ghost rock.

name: Roan
effect: Horse. Reaction: Boot the Roan instead of booting this dude when riding to a new location. You cannot move a booted dude in this fashion.

name: Robert Holmes
effect: Non-Unique Noon: Boot Holmes to retrieve any Gadget you control from any Boot Hill and shuffle it into your deck.

name: Robert Northrop Exp.
effect: Experienced. Harrowed. Any strike where Northrop is present produces double its normal ghost rock when Northrop is unbooted. Reaction: Boot Northrop and move him to a strike that has just been aced. The strike is no longer aced.

name: Rock Ridge Mine
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Rocket Pack
effect: Gadget Difficulty:6 Horse. Shootout: This dude moves to this location and joins one of the posses in this Shootout. Shootout: Boot the Pack to exit this Shootout and go home. Noon: Boot the Pack to move this dude to a different location.

name: Rumors
effect: Noon: One dude has his Influence reduced by one while he is at any location except at home. The dude's Influence is returned to normal after nightfall.

name: Sacrifice
effect: Noon Miracle 6: Boot this blessed. If this Miracle is successful, straighten one dude in play.

name: Sam Horowitz
effect: Cards with "Dynamite" or "Bomb" in their title have no ghost rock cost when being attached to Horowitz. Noon: Boot Horowitz. The deed Horowitz is in produces no ghost rock until after nightfall next turn, and Horowitz cannot perform any actions until after nightfall this turn.

name: San Simeon Mine
effect: Private. Non-Unique. Strike.

name: Sandra Harris
effect: Noon: Look at a random card in an another Player's Play Hand.

name: Saul Whateley
effect: Huckster:0 Reaction: Boot Saul as the target for a Hex is being selected to redirect the Hex to any other legal target.

name: Scalpin'
effect: Reaction: Play when one of your dudes just Aced another dude. Your dude gains Influence permanently equal to one half (round down) of the aced dude's Influence.

name: Schoolhouse
effect: Public. Government. Schoolhouse may not enter play if the Fear Level is above 3.

name: Scooter's Lift Winch
effect: Private. The ghost rock cost of the Lift winch is reduced to zero if you have Scooter in play. The Lift Winch is considered adjacent to any deed with a Winch token. Controller Noon: Boot the Lift Winch and pay 2 ghost rock to place a Winch token on an out of town deed you own.

name: Shadow Walk
effect: Noon Hex 4: If this Hex is successful, move this Huckster to any location in play. Reaction Hex 6: If this Hex is successful when a posse is being formed or moved, then this Huckster joins the posse, regardless of location.

name: Shortcut
effect: Reaction: Play when one of your dudes is moving to a new location (not as part of a posse). This move does not boot your dude.

name: Shotgun
effect: Weapon. Shootout: Ace any opposing dude whose value is equal to or lower than this dude's Bullet Rating.

name: Singing Feather
effect: Shaman:0 Reaction: Boot Singing Feather to cancel any action about to be taken by a Harrowed dude.

name: Sioux Union
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:18 Reaction: Instead of receiving your home's production during upkeep, you may get any one Spirit or Sioux dude from your deck, show it to your opponents, and put it in your hand.

name: Sir Whitmore
effect: Non-Unique. Huckster:0 Noon: Boot Sir Whitmore and pay 1 ghost rock to look at a Player's Play Hand.

name: Sister Mary Jebediah
effect: Blessed:1 Terrors cannot target Sister Mary with actions.

name: Smiling Lizard Lode
effect: Private. Strike. Any dude that is not a Terror is at a -1 Bullet penalty while in a Shootout at this location.

name: Smite
effect: Shootout Miracle X: The difficulty of this Miracle is an opposing dude's Value plus Bullets. If this Miracle is successful, the target is booted then sent home. If the Miracle is successful by more than 6 points, the target is aced as well. If you pull and ace or joker, the blessed loses the Blessed trait, permanently.

name: Snake Eyes
effect: Reaction: Play after any pull has been revealed to have the pull discarded. The Player performing the pull redraws.

name: Snakebite
effect: Cheatin'! Reaction: Play when another Player reveals an illegal Draw Hand during a Shootout. Ace one dude in his posse. Only one Cheatin'! card can be played against a Player per draw.

name: Sonic Destabilization Ray
effect: Gadget Difficulty:6 Noon Pull: Target a dude in play at the same location or adjacent to the dude carrying the ray. The target's value is reduced to the pull's value until after nightfall. If the pull is greater than the target's value, the ray has no effect.

name: Soul Blast
effect: Shootout Hex X: The difficulty of this Hex is an opposing Dude's value plus bullets. If this Hex is successful, the target is booted and sent home. If the Hex is successful by more than 5 points, the target is aced as well. If you pull an ace or Joker, the Huckster is also aced.

name: Speed of the Wolf
effect: Noon Spirit 5: If this Spirit is successful, move one of your unbooted dudes to any location in play. Reaction Spirit 7: If this Spirit is successful when a posse is being formed, then one of your unbooted dudes joins the posse, regardless of location.

name: Spirit of Kentucky Shaft
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Spirit Warrior
effect: Noon Spirit 3: If this Spirit is successful, give a +1 bullet bonus to any Sioux in play until after nightfall. Noon Spirit 7: If this Spirit is successful, give a +2 bullet bonus to any Sioux in play until after nightfall.

name: St. Martin's Chapel
effect: Public. Holy Ground. No Terrors may move to St. Martin's or call out a dude within it.

name: Stampede
effect: Every dude in the Town Square is moved home, booted. No dudes can move to the Town Square this turn.

name: Strength of the Bear
effect: Shootout Spirit 4: If this Spirit is successful, target one of your dudes in this Shootout who then cannot be aced in this Shootout unless you lose by at least 2 ranks. Shootout Spirit 7: If this Spirit is successful, target one of your dudes in this Shootout who then cannot be aced in this Shootout unless you lose by at least 3 ranks.

name: Strike Experiment #1
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Stuffed to the Gills Strike
effect: Private. Strike. The Fear Level is raised by two while the Stuffed to the Gills is in play.

name: Summon Spirit
effect: Shootout Spirit 6: If this Spirit is successful, a Spirit (dude) is summoned as a member of this posse with a 1 Draw Bullet rating. The Spirit is removed from play at the end of this shootout. Shootout Spirit 9: As above, but the Spirit has a 2 Stud Bullet rating.

name: Sun in Yer Eyes
effect: Shootout: Play at the beginning of a Shootout to give one opponent a -2 Bullet penalty (minimum zero) for this Shootout.

name: Sun Shu-Jen
effect: May not have any weapons. Shootout: Shu-Jen gains a +2 Bullet bonus if there are no weapons in the opposing posse. Shootout: Send home all dudes in the opposing posse with a value lower than Shu-Jen`s Bullet Rating.

name: Sunnyside Hotel
effect: Public. Brothel.

name: Surveyor's Office
effect: Private. When a deed with production greater than 3 enters play, the Owner of the Surveyor's office gets one ghost rock.

name: Sweaty Dynamite
effect: Noon Pull: If it is a Club, this dude is aced. Otherwise, boot this dude and leave the Dynamite on this deed. Any dude may ace this card, as a Noon Job. If the Dynamite is still on the deed after nightfall, the deed is aced.

name: Sweetrock
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:20 You cannot put into play or take control of a Dude from another Outfit if you already control a non-Sweetrock, non-Drifter Dude. You have one additional Control Point for each strike that you control that produces more than 5 ghost rock per turn. When playing lowball during the gambling phase, you draw and discard an additional card.

name: Takin' Precautions
effect: Reaction: Play this card immediately after an Event or action has completely resolved. That card and this one are both aced. This Action has no Ghost Rock cost for a Sweetrock player.

name: Tao Cheng "T.C."
effect: Shootout: T.C. gets a +2 Bullet bonus in a Shootout if none of the opponents is carrying a weapon.

name: Texas Twister
effect: Noon Hex 5: If this Hex is successful, boot one Dude at an adjacent location. Noon Hex X: If this Hex is successful, boot any one Dude in play. The difficulty of the Hex is the target's value plus Influence.

name: The 1st Bank of Gomorra
effect: Public. The Controller's ghost rock may not be stolen. If control of the First Bank changes, the new Controller takes half of the old Controller's ghost rock (round down). All dudes have their Influence reduced by one (minimum zero) while at the First Bank.

name: The Agency
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:17 You get one Victory Point after nightfall every time one of your dudes aces a Terror in a shootout if the Terror has a value of seven or more and ends the turn in Boot Hill.

name: The Alright Corral
effect: Private. Any horse the Controller is putting into play has its cost reduced by 3.

name: The Barber's Shop
effect: Public.

name: The Clock Tower
effect: Public. The controller of the Clock Tower gets one Shootout action before The Winner during any Shootout.

name: The Courthouse
effect: Public. Government. Only a Law Dog may move to the Courthouse. Controller Noon: Boot to make a dude un-Wanted. Controller Noon: Boot to ace any dude in jail.

name: The Dentist's Office
effect: Private.

name: The Docks
effect: Private. The cost of the Docks is decreased by two if you have Big Jake in play. The Docks produce ghost rock equal to the number of strikes in play.

name: The Fair Comes to Town
effect: Every dude with Influence greater than one is booted. Ace this card.

name: The Flock
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:19 Any strikes with Control Points are worth one extra Control Point while you control them.

name: The Gaping Maw Strike
effect: Private. Strike.

name: The Ghost Exp.
effect: Experienced. Harrowed. Reaction: When The Ghost is aced and is making his Harrowed pull, he goes home without booting unless you pull an ace. Noon: Boot The Ghost to gain 3 Ghost Rock.

name: The Gilded Feather
effect: Public. Brothel.

name: The Intelligence Shop
effect: Private. Controller Noon: Boot to raise a dude's Influence by one until after nightfall.

name: The Maze Rats
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:16 Your dudes may consider all strikes to be adjacent to your home. Noon: Boot one or more of your dudes at a strike you control. If the combined Bullet Rating of the dudes is higher than the production of the strike, you are considered the owner of the deed until the end of the game.

name: The Mission House
effect: Public. Out of Town. Holy Ground. No Terrors may move to the Mission House or call out a dude within it.

name: The Sabbath
effect: If the Fear Level is less than four, all Terrors are booted and cannot unboot or perform actions this turn.

name: The Slaughterhouse
effect: Private. Controller Noon: Boot the Slaughterhouse to remove any aced dude from play. That dude may not be brought into play by any player for the rest of this game.

name: The Texas Rangers
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:19 Noon: Boot one of your dudes to call out a Terror in the same or an adjacent location. Reaction: Boot when one of your dudes is moving (or joining a posse) to a location to which he or she is not allowed to move, to make the move legal.

name: The Tree
effect: Public. Any dudes at this location are considered adjacent to all deeds in town, but cannot be called out without a card effect.

name: The Twitch
effect: If The Twitch is aced during a shootout, send him home booted instead of to Boot Hill, and permanently reduce his printed Bullet rating by 1. If his printed Bullet rating is ever permanently reduced to 0, The Twitch is removed from play and cannot return.

name: The Undertaker's
effect: Private. The Controller gains 1 ghost rock every time a dude is aced.

name: Throw Down
effect: Noon: Boot one of your dudes to call out any dude at the same location that has a lower value. They begin a shootout that can't be refused.

name: Thunder Gulch Strike
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Tin Shield
effect: When the Tin Shield enters play, decide whether the shield will make the dude a Law Dog, Texas Ranger, or Agency. The dude is considered a member of that outfit while the Tin Shield is attached.

name: Tioga Joe Exp.
effect: Experienced. Other players cannot target Joe with Action cards.

name: Tombstone Dispatch Branch Office
effect: Private. The Dispatch Branch counts as 1 Influence for the Controller's total. Controller Reaction: Boot the Branch Office when a dude becomes Wanted. Gain 2 ghost rock.

name: Tombstone Frank
effect: Harrowed. Frank cannot be aced in a Shootout unless your hand is beaten by at least 3 ranks.

name: Town Hall
effect: Public. Government. Controller Reaction: Boot Town Hall and one or more of your dudes to prevent a deed from entering play. Your dudes must have more total Influence than the ghost rock cost of the deed to perform this action. The deed is aced, but no ghost rock is spent.

name: Town Well
effect: Public.

name: Turtle's Shell
effect: Shootout Spirit 6: If this Spirit is successful, you may subtract one from the number of Dudes that must be aced in each round for the rest of this Shootout.

name: Unholy Symbol
effect: Mystical. If this dude is a member of a posse that wins a shootout, the number of opposing dudes that must be aced is increased by one.

name: Unknown Hooded Figure
effect: Abomination. You must have a member of the Whateley Outfit in play to bring the Figure into play. The Figure can start the game in play. Reaction: The first time it is aced in a game, return the Figure home Harrowed as your first action next High Noon, and give it a permanent +1 Bullet bonus.

name: Unlucky Charm
effect: Shootout: Target a Dude in this shootout. No card effect can prevent that Dude from being aced in this shootout. Any card effect that would prevent that Dude from being aced is negated.

name: Vampiric Dance Hall Girl
effect: Abomination For each dude that is aced at the same location, she gains +1 Bullet until after nightfall.

name: Victor Navarro
effect: Reaction: Boot Victor to join any Shootout immediately after Draw Hands are shown if anyone in your gang is in the Shootout.

name: Walkin' Dead
effect: Abomination. The Walkin' Dead may not move to strikes. Any dude in a posse with the Walkin' Dead becomes wanted. Card Memory does not apply to the Walkin' Dead.

name: Wall Crawler
effect: Abomination. The Wall Crawler cannot move to or join posses at locations in town. The Wall Crawler cannot have goods. There is no limit to the number of Wall Crawlers that each player can have in play. Card Memory does not apply to Wall Crawlers

name: War Paint
effect: Noon: One of your dudes has +2 Bullets until nightfall.

name: Warrant
effect: Noon: Target any dude in play. Boot one or more of your dudes who have a combined Influence greater than the target. The target dude is now Wanted.

name: Water's Edge Strike
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Weaponsmith
effect: Controller Noon: Boot one of your dudes at this location. One weapon carried by this dude has its Bullet Rating increased by +1 until the end of the game. Each weapon can only be modified once in this fashion.

name: Werewolf
effect: Non-Unique. Abomination. You may not bring the Werewolf into play through normal means (starting with it or paying to play it from your hand as a Noon action). Goods cannot be attached to the Werewolf. Noon Pull: Boot the Werewolf. If the pull is Black, put a Lycanthrope dude into play from your Hand in the Werewolf's location. Put the Werewolf into your hand, discarding attached goods. You may only perform this action if the Fear Level is below 8.

name: Whateley Family Estate
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:17 Noon: Boot one of your Hucksters who is at a location where a dude was aced this turn. Your dude's Huckster skill is permanently increased by one.

name: Wilhelmina Whateley
effect: Huckster:3 If Wilhelmina ever dies, Whateley dudes in play can not take any actions this turn. Wilhelmina cannot move out of town. Noon: Boot Wilhelmina and pay ghost rock to produce combat bonuses. Each ghost rock paid gives a +1 Bullet bonus to a dude you control until after nightfall. No dude can receive more than a +2 Bullet bonus.

name: Winchester Rifle
effect: Weapon.

name: Wise Cloud
effect: Non-Unique. Shaman:2

name: Wrath
effect: Reaction: Cancel any one Shootout action card played during a Shootout with Wrath in the Shootout.

name: Xiong "Wendy" Cheng
effect: Shootout: Send one dude in the opposing posse home, booted. Wendy loses 2 bullets (minimum zero) and becomes a Draw until nightfall.

name: Yellow Belly
effect: Reaction: Play when a dude refuses when being called out. The dude is -1 Influence and -1 Bullet (minimum zero), permanently.

name: Zeke Beauchamp
effect: Shootout: Zeke gets a +2 Bullet bonus if there is a Terror in the opposing posse.

name: …And Scooter
effect: The cost to bring Scooter into play from your Play Hand and his upkeep are reduced by one if you have Big Jake in play.
